tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    current_stock INT,
    reorder_threshold INT,
    reorder_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);
CREATE TABLE inventory_items (id INT NOT NULL, item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, reorder_threshold INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (order_id INT NOT NULL, item_id INT NOT NULL, order_quantity INT NOT NULL, order_date DATE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE inventory_triggers (trigger_id INT NOT NULL, trigger_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, trigger_condition VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, action_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    order_quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    notification_date DATE
);
